description.excerpt:
We follow the Function Ontology to define transformation functions that are using in the rml mappings for improving the data quality of a Knowledge Graph Creation process. 
The repository is opened for contributions.
description.originalHeader: Definitions of declarative transformation functions using the Functions Ontology

description.excerpt: Definition of declarative functions following the Function Ontology

longTitle.excerpt: Definitions of declarative transformation functions using the Functions Ontology
